item.title: Lol some neard wants to actually (legally) wants to get married on rs!
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

Si Force:

If he wants to get married on RuneScape, who are we to step in the way of them and laugh at them. I personally don’t find this funny at all, I certainly hope they get the permission. Marriage is not something to laugh at, it is serious.

Lol.

Read full topic

item.title: Lol some neard wants to actually (legally) wants to get married on rs!
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

[quote=“Cody-Xo, post:23, topic:356334”]“Playing for 6 years”,
his total level is 765, check his Alog
You got trolled my friend.
Obvious troll is obvious…

Anyways, to answer the Zezima questions; Yes, he did get married in rs. No, it wasn’t his official marriage. Yes, he did marry the same girl irl, and I think they’re divorced now. They met on rs though, and he went and moved in with her for a while. She was pretty hawt tbh.[/quote]

I’ve been playing since 'o1. I’m only level 83 with around 1200 total.

I played RuneScape to socialize, which I still do to this day, except I rarely log in now.

Read full topic

egyptmo21:

Zezima really did that?!?!

Its his gf in real life. If my girlfriend said lets get married on runescape for fun id laugh my ass off, but still
I would do it. (For my girlfriend of course)

@Cody-Xo wrote:

“Playing for 6 years”,
his total level is 765, check his Alog
You got trolled my friend.
Obvious troll is obvious…

Anyways, to answer the Zezima questions; Yes, he did get married in rs. No, it wasn’t his official marriage. Yes, he did marry the same girl irl, and I think they’re divorced now. They met on rs though, and he went and moved in with her for a while. She was pretty hawt tbh.
